remarks: Elimination of a conditional operator contained in a wff ` ps ` . (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2005.)  (Proof shortened by NM, 25-Apr-2019.)
statement:
elimif.1 $e |- ( if ( ph , A , B ) = A -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
elimif.2 $e |- ( if ( ph , A , B ) = B -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
elimif $p |- ( ps <-> ( ( ph /\ ch ) \/ ( -. ph /\ th ) ) ) $.
